```{r setup}
#| Output: FALSE

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r df_simplify}
#| Output: FALSE

df <- read_csv("./Output/comm_ind_PINs_2006-2022.csv")

```

Changes from helper file:

1. Calculation of FMV
2. Drop exemption-related variables
3. Changed LoA for incentive classifications to 11.42%--need to change in helper file.

```{r changes}

df <- df |>
  mutate(assess_ratio = as.numeric(assess_ratio)) |>
  mutate(incent_prop = as.factor(incent_prop))

df <- df |>
  mutate(assess_ratio = ifelse(incent_prop == "Incentive", .1142, assess_ratio)) |>
  mutate(fmv = av_clerk/assess_ratio) |>
  select(!(starts_with("exe_"))) |>
  select(-loa_2022, -Option2, -Res_nonRes, -assessment_level, -used_in2021)

```

```{r csv_print}
#| eval: false

write_csv(df, "./Output/panel_data_6-28.csv")

```
